block.p: RUOTOLO-James. On August 31, 2000. Beloved husband of the late Rose Ruotolo (nee Tarantino). Loving father of Charles, George, Barbara and Debra. Cherished grandfather and great-grandfather. Friends may visit, Sunday and Monday, 2:00 to 4:30 and 7:00 to 9:30 PM, at the New Hyde Park Funeral Home, 506 Lakeville Rd, New Hyde Park, NY. Funeral Tuesday, 10 AM, at the funeral home. Interment St. Charles Cemetery, Farmingdale, NY.
